0110011001010110 1100101011001100 1 -> sum: 0011000100100011, cout: 1
1000000001000101 0010111101001011 0 -> sum: 1010111110010000, cout: 0
0110011011001111 1010000101101000 0 -> sum: 0000100000110111, cout: 1

0111101110101111 1010111111110011 1 -> sum: 0010101110100011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
